channel.title: Rackscape 667 loading 711
channel.description:
[b][CENTER][B][SIZE=6]RackScape 667 loading 711.[/SIZE] Economy, PvP System, Loads Of Shops, Bosses, Minigames, Friendly Staff[/B][/CENTER]
[CENTER]]Well Guys, Before you say Leach, This is friend of mines server, He asked me to do this for him, There will be a lot of updates on the server in the next day and half, So if you cant login, I'm Sorry,[/CENTER]
[center][font=arial black]Download client:[url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/70234427/RackScapev8.jar]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/70234427/RackScapev8.jar[/url] Website:[url=http://rackscape.co.cc/]http://rackscape.co.cc/[/url] (website is not complete yet,)[/font][/center]
[center][FONT=Arial Black] We are looking for a wide range of players, And player pking styles, Everyone will be welcomed by a staff member Or a player at home :) Also looking for a stable balance of Pking and players :) [/FONT][/center]
[CENTER]][FONT=Arial Black] About RackScape 667 -Economy Based -Shops -Storm Of Arma & Polpore Staff -Re written skills -Dominion tower -Equipment stats fixes -Prices -Bonuses -Packed npc's & shops -711 cache packed by Dan -Re written combat -Item wielding fixes -Item bonus on equipment stats fix -Global objects & Npchandling & spawning -New exp rates -Fixed exp rates -New skills -Summoning scrolls perfected -Auras (Activating, Deactivating, Recharging) -Dedicated server -Bosses -Friendly Staff -Lunars/Ancients/Moderns -Curses (With Quick Prayers) -All Weapon Special Attacks -New Armours -Vps -News -Server Messages[/COLOR][/FONT][/CENTER]
[CENTER][FONT=Arial Black]The Server hasnt got much to offer yet, I am helping the server out with these updates:[/CENTER] [FONT=Arial Black][CENTER] *Fully working 63 wave jad, *fully working Duel arena (currently about 50%) *Full God-wars with all monster drops *Adding Working Rune-span *adding Skin colours such as:Red,purple
Some Of the media is not the best, I'm sorry about that.
